titleStmt.title: A MAP of The TENNASSEE GOVERNMENT formerly Part of NORTH CAROLINA taken Chiefly from Surveys by Gen,[era]l D. Smith. & others / Engraved by J. T. Scott : a machine readable transcription of an image
titleStmt.author: Scott, J. T.

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: A MAP of The TENNASSEE GOVERNMENT formerly Part of NORTH CAROLINA taken Chiefly from Surveys by Gen,[era]l D. Smith. & others / Engraved by J. T. Scott
bibl.author: Scott, J. T.
bibl.note: This document is a rare map of Tennessee surveyed and engraved circa 1795. The map shows public roads, Indian boundaries, forts, Indian towns, and width of rivers in yards.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.head:
A MAP of The TENNASSEE GOVERNMENT formerly Part of NORTH CAROLINA taken Chiefly from Surveys by
Gen'l General D. Smith. & others J. T. Scott. Folio

570. TENNESSEE. Map of the Tennassee Government, formerly Part of North Carolina, taken chiefly from Surveys by Gen'l D. Smith and others. Engraved by J.T. Scott. Folio. [Phila: M. Carey, 1795]. Very rare and early map of Tennessee, showing Public Roads, Indian Boundaries, Forts, Indian Towns, Width of Rivers in Yards, etc et cetera .

figure.figDesc: This is an image of a map of the Tennassee Government, formerly part of North Carolina, ca. 1775
